name: Finger Drift Max: Touch Racing Drifty Chase
name_original: Finger Drift Max: Touch Racing Drifty Chase
description:
Download Finger Drift Max for FREE and play a real drift racing game now! Compete with your friends and see who can be the king of drifting in this intense and addictive pixel car racing & drifting simulator. This game is 2 fast & 2 furious, so get ready and prepare yourself for the fierce competition from players from around the world!
People just LOVE to play car racing games! There are so many types of racing games such as pixel car racings, real drift racing games, and many more. Many people love to play drifting simulator ever since the popularity of Tokyo Drift and they want to be a hard core drifter who can drift cars on their Android phones. That’s why we create our Finger Drift Max game and we hope that this will be the best car drifting simulator you ever play!
GAMEPLAY: To control your vehicle, you should press the screen with your thumbs to make your car turn. Press your right thumb to drift car and make it turn around to the right side and press your left thumb to make it turn around to the left. While drifting, you should avoid other cars on your way. You should think and move fast because there are a lot of cars that are obstructing your way and they move 2 fast, 2 furious. If you hit these 2 fast and 2 furious cars, you will die and you have to restart the game. You also can get bomb to detonate all other cars.
FEATURES OF FINGER DRIFT MAX – KING OF DRIFTING:
>> FREE GAME TO PLAY
Want to experience real drift racing like in the Tokyo Drift story? Now you can do it for FREE on your Android phone!
>> MINIMALIST & MODERN GAME GRAPHIC
Our best car drifting game uses minimalist 2D graphic which allows you to focus on the game and not get distracted by other unnecessary objects. The simple graphic also means that our game won’t hog your phone’s battery and resources.
>> FUN & ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY
The rule is simple: use your thumbs to drift car and makes it turn around while avoiding other cars. However, the simplicity is what makes it very addictive and fun. You can focus on the main gameplay without having to think about upgrading or unlocking new cars. Just focus on achieving as high score as possible!
>> UPBEAT MUSIC AND REALISTIC SOUND EFFECT
Any game will be enjoyable if it’s accompanied by awesome music. We have chosen a great upbeat background music to accompany you play and you can also enjoy the realistic sound effects. You will feel like you are a pro & hard core drifter in the middle of Tokyo drift race!
>> LEADERBOARD & ACHIEVEMENTS
Unlock achievements and try to get as high score as you can!
So, are you really a hard core drifter who never backs down from a challenge? Are you ready to be the king of drifting in this dream car racing game?
Play Finger Drift – Dream Car Racing now!
---
We sure hope that this dream car racing & pixel car racing game will entertain you! If you have fun, please support our effort to improve this game & develop more games by leaving a rating & review!
